name: sanitize-html

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js > dist/sanitize-html-es2015.js --standalone 'sanitizeHtml' && babel dist/sanitize-html-es2015.js --out-file dist/sanitize-html.js --presets=@babel/preset-env
scripts.minify: npm run build && uglifyjs dist/sanitize-html.js > dist/sanitize-html.min.js
scripts.test: npx eslint . && npm run prepublishOnly && mocha test/test.js
